name: DoUrHw!
description:
Made for the Low effort game jam. Controls are W'A'S'D to move, and Mouse click to 'interact' with the few things you can interact with. You also might use enter like once, or esc if you're feeling like it. Anyway do ur hw or your parents will b very upset with you. And so will I :O  ITS IMPORTANT TO NOTE IF YOU HIT ESC IT CAN BUG OUT THE MOUSELOCK ON WEBGL SO BE SURE TO CLICK BACK ON THE WHITE SQUARE IN THE MIDDLE SO ITS PROPERLY ALIGNED. 

Best of luck finding the true ending ;)
